Don't take requests and I don't encode those movies...

Don't know if anyone else has noticed, but the video on all these recent Last Stand encodes is kind of messed up. For example take a look at the stuttering at 1:25:47. Probably happens in other places too. Seems to be from the HDClub source.

OMG!! THANK YOU! You're Incredible!

Way To Go!!
Phase700b -- Please tell me you haven't downloaded ALL the Last Stand postings.
No. Only this one and 3 others. I have a 92" display, video problems are really obvious on it. I'll wait for other Blu-ray sources to become available.
